Uses of Class
blackjack.Card

  • Uses of Card in blackjack

    Methods in blackjack that return Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Card Hand.addCard​(Card newCard)
    Method that adds a card to a hand
    Card Deck.getCard​(int i)
    Method that is a getter for card inside the deck in specific index
    Card Hand.getCard​(int i)
    Method that returns a card of hand, given by the index i
    Card Dealer.getFirstCard()
    Getter for the dealer's first card
    Card Dealer.getHoleCard()
    Getter for the dealer's hole card
    Card Deck.pickCard()
    Method that picks a card, removes it from the deck and then returns it
    Card Shoe.pickCard()
    This method picks a card from the deck, returns it and sends it to the trashed cards array
    Card Card.stringToCard​(java.lang.String rank, java.lang.String suit)
    Method that transforms a card's information (rank and suit) in a string format to a Card object
    Methods in blackjack with parameters of type Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Card Hand.addCard​(Card newCard)
    Method that adds a card to a hand
    void AceFiveStrategy.addToCount​(Card newCard)
    This method updates the value of the aceFiveCount parameter based on the value of a given card
    void HiLoStrategy.addToCount​(Card newCard)
    Method that adds an inserted card to the count
    Choice BasicStrategy.choice​(Card dealersCard, Hand playerHand)
    This is the constructor of the AceFiveStrategy class
    Choice HiLoStrategy.choice​(Card dealersCard, Hand playerHand)
    This method is used in order to obtain the correct hi-lo choice
